articles.title: Survey: Nearly half of Malaysians prefer Pfizer, Moderna for Covid-19 vaccine, zero trust for Sputnik V - Malay Mail
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 17 — A survey covering South-east Asia found that Covid-19 vaccines from American firms Pfizer and Moderna emerged as Malaysia's most preferred brands after gaining 48 per cent of votes from respondents. The report released yesterday by the …
